name: QRY_EVIDENCE_NOTE_CSN_ID
description: This table extracts information related to the contact the evidence came from.

columns.name: QUERY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the query record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EVIDENCE_NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the contact of the note record that contains this evidence.

columns.name: QUERY_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.
